!Gandi Chief Chianta: Tejakar Oroka! As a Warrior of the great Orc race and an honorable Envoy of the Lord of Flame, go now to the battlefield and punish the renegade tribes! Bring back *20 Timak Orc heads* and *20 Tamlin Orc heads* as trophies of war! That is the least punishment those traitors deserve! Come back to me when you have collected these trophies!
